Isidro C. C. tiene 39 años. Es casado vive con la esposa y los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Guaranda en la Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 5 hijos.

Isidro  pertenece a la Ventanilla Casaiche Chilipamba ubicada a media hora de Guaranda perteneciente, es un grupo que se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería como vacas lecheras y chanchos, esta ventanilla tiene 20 miembros.

Isidro se dedica a la agricultura de maíz, trigo fréjol y papa y a la ganadería cría vacas lecheras, las comprar las realiza en Guaranda y vende en el mercado mayorista de la  misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para la siembra maíz, trigo fréjol y papa y animales para engordar y después vender. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades de la familia. Su sueño es ponerse comprar casa, carro y terrenos para tener sus animales.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Isidro C. C. is 39 years old, is married and lives with his wife and 5 children; they live in the Guaranda area in the Province of Bolívar.

Isidro belongs to the Ventanilla Casaiche Chilipamba located half an hour from Guaranda. It is a group that dedicates themselves to agriculture and stock breeding like dairy cows and pigs, the group has 20 members.

Isidro grows corn, wheat, beans, and potatoes and breeds dairy cows. He buys in Guaranda and sells to a wholesale market in the same city.

He needs the loan to buy merchandize to grow corn, wheat, beans and potatoes and animals to fatten up and later sell. The loan will help him financially to meet his families’ needs. His dream is to be able to buy a home, car and fields to have his animals.

Isidro enjoys practicing sports.

loans.use: To buy merchandize to grow corn, wheat, beans and potatoes and animals to fatten up and later sell.

loans.name: Leh We Help Weself Group

texts.en:
Meet members of the “Leh We Help Weself” group from Makeni, a city in northern Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, to apply for a loan of SLL 800,000 for each. With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions. 

Augusta B. S. is the leader of this group. The thirty-year-old is married to a teacher and they have two children. Augusta has been a businesswoman for fifteen years now. She sells bags, shoes, clothes, cloth, body sprays, creams, etc. Augusta will use her share of this loan to buy the above-mentioned items in large quantity to add to her business inventory.

loans.use: Buy bags, shoes, clothes, cloth, body sprays, creams, etc.

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es:
Guillermina pertenece al banco comunal “Juntas y Unidas” D. la Asociación Arariwa D. la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad. Cusco es una ciudad encantadora que se remonta a los tiempos Incas. Construida en la base D. la antigua ciudad Inca. 

Guillermina tiene 56 años, es casada y fruto D. esta unión tiene cuatro hijos, ella alterna sus actividades del hogar con su pequeño negocio D. preparación y venta D. tortas y  bocaditos a pedido del cliente, ella también se dedica a la elaboración D. tejidos como chompas. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Guillermina desprenD. una imagen D. una madre trabajadora y responsable. Con su próximo préstamo, Guillermina que espera recibir $ 500 USD. Por el momento,  desea incrementar el negocio y va comprar insumos como harina, azúcar, leche, etc.
 
Guillermina se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Guillermina belongs to the “Juntas y Unidas” (Together and United) communal bank of the Arariwa Association in the city of Cusco; she lives in the same city. Cusco is a beautiful city that goes back to Incan times; it was built in the base of the ancient Inca city.

Guillermina is 56 years old, is married and through this union she has four children. She alternates her activities in the home with her small business where she prepares and sells cakes as well as candies on the request of her customers, she also knits sweaters. It has been a few years that she has been involved in this business and she does very well thanks to the hard work that she puts into her business. Guillermina is a picture of a hardworking and responsible mother. With the next loan that Guillermina hopes to receive of $500 USD, she hopes to expand her business and will buy foodstuffs like flour, sugar, milk, etc.

Guillermina is very grateful for the opportunity given to her through this medium and is committed to meet with the payments agreed according to schedule.

loans.use: To expand her business and to buy foodstuffs like flour, sugar, milk, etc.

loans.name: Jaime Jorge

texts.es:
Jaime Jorge C. A. tiene 22 años. Es casado vive con la esposa y los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Guaranda en la Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 2 hijos.

Jaime  pertenece a la Ventanilla Casaiche Chilipamba ubicada a media hora de Guaranda perteneciente, es un grupo que se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería como vacas lecheras y chanchos, esta ventanilla tiene 20 miembros.

Jaime se dedica a la agricultura de maíz, trigo fréjol y papa y a la ganadería cría vacas lecheras, las comprar las realiza en Guaranda y vende en el mercado mayorista de la  misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para la siembra maíz, trigo fréjol y papa y animales para engordar y después vender. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades de la familia. Su sueño es ponerse comprar casa, carro y terrenos para tener sus animales.
Le gustaría que la cooperativa le siga apoyando con los créditos.
texts.en:
Jaime Jorge C. A. is 22 years old, is married and lives with his wife and 2 children; they live in the Guaranda area, province of Bolívar.

Jaime belongs to the Ventanilla Casaiche Chilipamba located half an hour from Guaranda. It is a group that dedicates themselves to agriculture and stock breeding like dairy cows and pigs, the group has 20 members.

Jaime grows corn, wheat, beans, and potatoes and breeds dairy cows. He buys in Guaranda and sells to a wholesale market in the same city.

He needs the loan to buy merchandize to grow corn, wheat, beans and potatoes and animals to fatten up and later sell. The loan will help him financially to meet his families’ needs. His dream is to be able to buy a home, car and fields to have his animals.

Jaime would like for his cooperative to keep helping him with loans.

loans.use: To buy merchandize to grow corn, wheat, beans and potatoes and animals to fatten up and later sell.

loans.name: Sorbeh I I I Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “Sorbeh III” group. They run small scale businesses based in Makeni, a city in Northern Sierra Leone. This is the first loan these entrepreneurs are accessing from SMT/Kiva lenders. With this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more profit and consequently improve their standard of living. 

The leader of this group is Adama K.. Adama is age 37. She is married to a tailor and the couple has four children. Adama has been a businesswoman for ten years now. She sells palm oil, rice, sugar, etc. With the help of this loan, she will buy these items in large supply to add to her business.

loans.use: To buy palm oil, rice, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “ÑAHUPACMAN PURISUN ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito D. Huanchac, provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra.  Justina;   ella tiene 58 años D. edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos, La socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con el comercio minorista, la socia compra y venD. mercadería (videos D. películas, música, documentales, etc.); La socia desea aumentar su mercadería y D. este modo incrementar sus ganancias. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. mercadería para su negocio.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “Ñahupacman Purisun" communal bank.  The bank is located in Huanchac District, Cusco Province and Cusco Department.

The member's name is Justina.  She is 58 years old, married, and has three children.  She alternates household activities with her retail business buying and selling merchandise (videos of films, music, documentaries, etc.).  Justina  wants to increase her inventory and in this way improve her earnings.  The member asks for the loan to invest in buying merchandise for her business.

Justina is grateful for and values the loan granted her through this medium, and she promises to make her payments on schedule.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise (videos) for her business

loans.name: Segundo Tiburcio

texts.es:
Segundo Tiburcio C. L. tiene 42 años. Es casado vive con la esposa y los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Guaranda en la Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 8 hijos.

Segundo  pertenece a la Ventanilla Casaiche Chilipamba ubicada a media hora de Guaranda perteneciente, es un grupo que se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería como vacas lecheras y chanchos, esta ventanilla tiene 20 miembros.

Segundo se dedica a la agricultura de maíz, trigo fréjol y papa y a la ganadería cría vacas lecheras, las comprar las realiza en Guaranda y vende en el mercado mayorista de la  misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para la siembra maíz, trigo fréjol y papa y animales para engordar y después vender. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades de la familia. Su sueño es ponerse comprar casa, carro y terrenos para tener sus animales.

Le gustaría que la cooperativa le siga apoyando con los créditos y que el monto sea más alto.
texts.en:
Segundo Tiburcio C. L. is 42 years old.  He is married and lives with his wife and children in Guaranda Canton, which is in Bolívar Province.  He has eight children.

Segundo belongs to the Casaiche Chilipamba Solidarity Group, located half an hour from Guaranda. It is a group that works in agriculture and raising livestock like dairy cows and pigs.  The solidarity group has 20 members.

Segundo grows corn, wheat, beans and potatoes, and he raises dairy cows.  He makes purchases in Guaranda and makes his sales at the wholesale market in the same city.

He is asking for the loan to buy supplies for sowing corn, wheat, beans and potatoes, and to buy animals to fatten and sell.  The loan will help him supply his family's needs.  His dream is to be able to buy a house, a car and land to keep his animals on.

He would like the Cooperative to continue helping him with loans in higher amounts.

loans.use: Purchasing supplies for sowing corn, wheat, beans and potatoes, and buying animals to fatten and sell

loans.name: Telma

texts.es:
Telma pertenece al banco comunal “Juntas y Unidas” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad. Cusco es una ciudad encantadora que se remonta a los tiempos Incas. Construida en la base de la antigua ciudad Inca. 

Telma tiene 50 años, es madre y padre para sus cinco hijos, ella alterna sus actividades del hogar con su pequeño negocio de   venta de productos de belleza de forma independiente. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Telma es una mujer trabajadora y responsable que saca a delante a su familia. Con su próximo préstamo, Telma que espera recibir $ 200 USD. Por el momento,  desea incrementar el negocio y va comprar mas cosméticos como por ejemplo perfumes, aretes, etc. 

Telma se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Telma belongs to the Juntas y Unidas (Together and United) communal bank of Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco, and she lives in the same city.  Cusco is an enchanting city which hearkens back to the time of the Incas.  It is built on the ancient Incan city. 

Telma is 50 years old.  She is both mother and father to her five children, and she alternates household activities with her small business as an independent seller of beauty products.  She has done this for several years now, and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  Telma is a hardworking and responsible woman who takes care of her family.  Telma hopes to receive $200 USD for her next loan.  At the moment, she wants to increase her business and is going to buy more cosmetics like perfumes, earrings, etc.

Telma is grateful for the opportunity granted her through this medium, and she promises to make her payments on schedule.

loans.use: Buy more cosmetics like perfumes, earrings, etc.

JAIME se dedica a la agricultura de maíz, trigo fréjol y papa y a la ganadería cría vacas lecheras, las comprar las realiza en Guaranda y vende en el mercado mayorista de la  misma ciudad.

Le gustaría que la cooperativa le siga apoyando.

Jaime Jorge C. A. is 25 years old.  He is married and lives with his wife and  two children in Guaranda canton in Bolívar province.

Jaime is a member of the Casaiche Chilipamba solidarity group which is located half an hour from Guaranda.  It is a group that works in agriculture and farming livestock such as dairy cows and pigs.  The group has 20 members.

Jaime grows corn, beans and potatoes and raises dairy cows.  He makes his purchases in Guaranda and sells in the wholesale market in the same town.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies for sowing corn, beans and potatoes and also animals to fatten and then sell.  The support of the loan will help him to fulfil his family's financial needs.  His dream is to be able to buy a house, car and land for his animals.  He would like Cooperativa San José to continue supporting him.

loans.use: To buy supplies for sowing corn, wheat, beans and potatoes.  To buy animals to fatten and then sell.

loans.name: Sorbeh Traders Group

texts.en:
Here are members of the “Sorbeh Traders” group from the northern city of Makeni. They are petty traders who have applied for a loan of SLL 800,000 for each in order to expand their businesses. With the help of this loan, these petty traders will be able to add more goods to their businesses so that sales will increase. In this way, they can easily repay the loan and better look after themselves and their children. 

The leader of this group is Isatu K.. The 43-year-old sells market food – rice and palm-oil. She has been in this business for many years now. With her share of this loan, she will expand her business by buying rice and palm oil in large quantity to add to her business inventory.

loans.use: Buy rice and palm oil in large quantity

DIEGO se dedica a la agricultura de maíz, trigo fréjol y papa y a la ganadería cría vacas lecheras, las comprar las realiza en Guaranda y vende en el mercado mayorista de la  misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para la siembra maíz, trigo fréjol y papa y animales para engordar y después vender. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades de la familia. Su sueño es ponerse comprar casa, carro y terrenos para tener sus animales.

Le gustaría caminar por el campo

DIEGO belongs to the the Casaiche Chilipamba community bank. It is located half an hour from Guaranda. The members of the group work in agriculture and farming, with dairy cows and pigs. The group has 20 members.

DIEGO farms corn, wheat, beans, potatoes and he takes care of dairy cows. He buys them in Guaranda and sells them in the wholesale market in the same city.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies for harvesting corn, wheat, beans, potatoes and for fattening and then selling dairy cows. The loan’s support would allow him to help his family economically with their household expenses. His dream is to buy a house, a car and land for his animals.

He would like to walk through the countryside.

loans.use: to buy supplies for harvesting corn, wheat, beans and potatoes and for fattening and selling dairy cows

Justa se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.

Justa has been dedicated to the business for various years and it is going well, thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  Justa is a hard-working and responsible woman who leads her family forward.  

With this loan, Justa hopes to receive $400 U.S.  At present, she wants to increase business and she is going to buy more cosmetics, including, for example, perfumes, and earrings, etc.  Justa is grateful for the opportunity offered by this means and, also, she is committed to complying with the payments as scheduled.

loans.use: BUYING MORE COSMETICS; FOR EXAMPLE, PERFUMES, AND ALSO EARRINGS, ETC

She divides her time between her household activities and her small family business selling 'cultural books' (works of literature).  In her home she runs a company which sells her products to private institutions and to the general public.  She has been in this business for several years and it is doing very well thanks to the great effort which she puts into her work.  Luisa is a hard-working and responsible woman who is getting her family ahead in life.  With her loan for $450, Luisa would like to increase her business and buy more books.

Luisa is grateful for the opportunity she is being given with this loan and therefore pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy more books

texts.es:
Doña Jesús, tiene 60 años D. edad, resiD. en Concepción Batres departamento D. Usulután, donD. vive con sus hijos D. 26 y 24 años D. edad, más la esposa D. uno D. sus hijos.
Ella se dedica a la crianza D. pollos negocio que inicio con la esposa D. su hijo, no tienen horario pues la granja la tienen en su propia casa, ya tienen varios clientes que solamente les hacen los pedidos D. huevo para salir solo a dejarlos a las viviendas, ella quiere comprar más gallinas ponedoras, ampliar la granja y darle mantenimiento, por eso solicita un préstamo que le ayuD. a realizar esta inversión que es su única fuente D. ingresos. 
Doña Jesús sueña con ser vendedora mayorista D. huevos y distribuir por todo Concepción Batres mejorando D. esta manera los ingresos para su hogar.
texts.en:
Doña Jesús is 60 years old.  She lives in Concepción Batres in the department of Usulután with her children who are 26 and 24 years old.  She also lives with the father of one of her children.

She has a business raising chickens.  She started the business with her son's father.  They don't have fixed working hours since their farm is on their own property.  They already have several customers who place orders for eggs and she goes out on her own to deliver them to their homes. She would like to buy more laying hens, expand the farm and do some maintenance work on it.  She is requesting a loan which will help her to make this investment as it is her only source of income.

Doña Jesús dreams of being able to sell eggs wholesale and distribute them all over Concepción Batres, thereby improving her household income.

loans.use: To buy laying hens

loans.name: Nancy Piedad

texts.es:
Nancy Piedad C. P. tiene 21 años. Es casada vive con el esposo y los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Guaranda en la Provincia de Bolívar. No tiene hijos.

Nancy pertenece a la Ventanilla Casaiche Chilipamba ubicada a media hora de Guaranda perteneciente, es un grupo que se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería como vacas lecheras y chanchos, esta ventanilla tiene 20 miembros.

Nancy se dedica a la agricultura de maíz, trigo fréjol y papa y a la ganadería cría vacas lecheras, las comprar las realiza en Guaranda y vende en el mercado mayorista de la  misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para la siembra maíz, trigo fréjol y papa y animales para engordar . Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades de la familia. Su sueño es ponerse comprar casa y carro.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Nancy Piedad C. P. is 21 years old.  She is married and lives with her husband.  They live in Guaranda canton, in Bolívar province.  They don't have any children.

Nancy belongs to the Casaiche Chilipamba solidarity group which is located half an hour from Guaranda.  It is a group that works in agriculture and farming livestock such as dairy cows and pigs.  The group has 20 members.

Nancy grows corn, wheat, beans and potato and also raises dairy cows.  He makes his purchases in Guaranda and sells in the wholesale market in the same town.

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies for sowing corn, wheat, beans and potatoes and also animals to fatten and then sell.  The support from the loan will help her to fulfil her family's financial needs.  Her dream is to be able to buy a house and car.

She likes to take part in sports.

loans.use: To buy supplies for sowing corn, wheat, beans and potatoes.  To buy animals to fatten and then sell

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
Maria Teresa C. A. tiene 33 años. Es casada vive con el esposo y los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Guaranda en la Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 4 hijos.

Maria pertenece a la Ventanilla Casaiche Chilipamba ubicada a media hora de Guaranda perteneciente, es un grupo que se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería como vacas lecheras y chanchos, esta ventanilla tiene 20 miembros.

Maria se dedica a la agricultura de maíz, trigo fréjol y papa y a la ganadería cría vacas lecheras, las comprar las realiza en Guaranda y vende en el mercado mayorista de la  misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para la siembra maíz, trigo fréjol y papa  y animales para engordar y después vender. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades de la familia. Su sueño es ponerse comprar casa y dar la educación a los hijos.
Le gusta escuchar música.
texts.en:
Maria Teresa C. A. is 33 years old.  She is married, and she lives with her husband and their children in the Guaranda canton in the Bolívar province.  She has four children.

Maria belongs to the Casaiche Chilipamba Communal Bank, which is half an hour from Guaranda. It is a group that works in agriculture and farming livestock such as dairy cows and pigs. The group has 20 members.

Maria grows corn, wheat, beans, and potatoes.  She also raises dairy cows.  She buys them in Guaranda, and she sells them in the wholesale market in the same city.

She is requesting the loan to buy supplies for her corn, wheat, bean, and potato crops.  She also wants the loan to buy animals to fatten and later sell.  The the loan will help her provide her family with the necessities.  

Her dream is to buy a house and to educate her children.

She likes to listen to music.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her corn, wheat, bean, and potato crops and to buy animals to fatten and later sell

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
Justina pertenece al banco comunal “Juntas y Unidas” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad. Cusco es una ciudad encantadora que se remonta a los tiempos Incas. Construida en la base de la antigua ciudad Inca. 

Justina tiene 46 años, es madre y padre para sus tres hijos. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de materiales de construcción como por ejemplo arena, piedra chancada y yeso. La puede encontrar a la socia todos los días de 7 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la noche en su pequeño negocio. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Justina es una mujer trabajadora y responsable que saca a delante a su familia. Con su próximo préstamo, Justina que espera recibir $ 700 USD. Por el momento,  desea incrementar el negocio y va comprar materiales de construcción como arena, piedra chancada, etc.   
 
Justina se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Justina belongs to the “Juntas y Unidas” (Together and United) Communal Bank with the Asociación Arariwa.  The bank is in the city of Cusco, and she lives in that city.  Cusco is a charming city that dates back to the time of the Incas. It is built on the site of the ancient Inca city.

Justina, age 46, is both mother and father to her three children.  She sells construction materials like sand, stone, and gravel.  She can be found in her small business everyday from seven in the morning until six at night.  She has been in this business for several years.  It is going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work. Justina is a hard-working and responsible woman who gets her family ahead.

Justina hopes to receive $700 USD with her next loan.  For now she wants to increase her business.  She will buy construction material like sand, stone, and gravel, etc.

Justina is grateful for the opportunity she is being given with this loan and therefore pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy construction material like sand, stone, and gravel, etc.

He is asking for the loan to buy materials to plant corn, wheat, beans and potatoes as well as animals to fatten up and later sell. The support of the loan will support him financially for his family's needs. His dream is to buy a house and land. He likes to play soccer.

Alfonso pertenece a la Ventanilla Casaiche Chilipamba ubicada a media hora de Guaranda perteneciente, es un grupo que se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería como vacas lecheras y chanchos, esta ventanilla tiene 20 miembros.

loans.name: Juan Victor

texts.es:
Juan Víctor pertenece al banco comunal “Juntas y Unidas” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad. Cusco es una ciudad encantadora que se remonta a los tiempos Incas. Construida en la base de la antigua ciudad Inca. 

Juan Víctor tiene 27 años y es soltero. Su actividad económica principal es brindar servicios de taxi. El socio trabaja desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche todos los días. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Juan Víctor es una joven trabajador y responsable que sale a delante. Con su próximo préstamo, Juan Víctor que espera recibir $ 500 USD. Por el momento,  desea utilizar el dinero del préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro. 

Juan Víctor se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Juan Víctor belongs to Asociación Arariwa's “Juntas y Unidas” (Together and United) community bank in the city of Cusco.  He lives in the same city.  Cusco is a charming city which dates back to Inca times.  It was built on the site of the ancient Inca city.

Juan Víctor is 27 years old and single.  His main business activity is providing taxi services.  He works from 6 in the morning until 7 in the evening every day.  He has been in this business for several years and it is going very well thanks to the great effort which he puts into his work.  Juan Víctor is a hard-working and responsible young man who is getting ahead.  With his loan for $500 USD, Juan Víctor would like to have maintenance work done on  his car.

Juan Víctor is grateful for the opportunity which he is being given with this loan and therefore pledges to make his repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To have maintenance work done on his car

Jaime pertenece a la Ventanilla Casaiche Chilipamba ubicada a media hora de Guaranda perteneciente, es un grupo que se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería como vacas lecheras y chanchos, esta ventanilla tiene 20 miembros.

Jaime belongs to the Casaiche Chilipamba solidarity group which is located half an hour from Guaranda.  It is a group that works in agriculture and farming livestock such as dairy cows and pigs.  The group has 20 members.

Jaime grows corn, beans and potatoes and raises dairy cows.  He makes his purchases in Guaranda and sells in the wholesale market in the same town.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies for sowing corn, beans and potatoes and also animals to fatten and then sell.  The support of the loan will help him to fulfil his family's financial needs.  His dream is to be able to buy a house and land.

loans.name: Wilber Alexander

texts.es:
Wilber de 27 años de edad, reside en San Jorge departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposa y su hijo de 4 meses, se dedica a la filmación de videos y fotografías, inicio su negocio cuando termino de recibir un curso de fotografías, trabaja solo y no tiene horario fijo atendiendo este negocio desde hace 8 años.
El quiere comprar una cámara de video y para realizar esta compra solicita un préstamo ya que con esta cámara podrá cubrir mas eventos sociales ayudando de esta manera a que su hogar reciba más ingresos para solventar las necesidades diarias.
El sueño de Wilber es tener un local de fotografías mas grande, aumentar los clientes, y mantener en buenas condiciones a su familia.
texts.en:
Wilber, age 27, lives in San Jorge, department of San Miguel. He lives with his wife and 4 month old son. He is in the business of making videos and taking photographs. He began his business when he completed a photography course. He works alone and does not have a fixed schedule. He has had the business for 8 years.

He wants to buy a video camera, and, in order to accomplish this purchase, he has applied for a loan. With this camera he will be able to cover more social events. In this way he will help his household to receive more income in order to pay for daily necessities. Wilber’s dream is to have a larger photography shop, add customers, and maintain good conditions for his family.

loans.use: Purchase of a video camera.

loans.name: Nelly Virginia

texts.es:
Nelly  Virginia  pertenece al banco comunal “Juntas y Unidas” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad. Cusco es una ciudad encantadora que se remonta a los tiempos Incas. Construida en la base de la antigua ciudad Inca. 

Nelly  Virginia  tiene 45 años y tiene cuatro hijos. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de materiales de construcción como por ejemplo arena, piedra chancada y yeso. La puede encontrar a la socia todos los días de 7 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la noche en su pequeño negocio. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Nelly  Virginia  es una mujer trabajadora y responsable que saca a delante a su familia. Con su próximo préstamo, Nelly  Virginia  que espera recibir $ 400 USD. Por el momento,  desea incrementar el negocio y va comprar materiales de construcción como bloquetas de construcción, ladrillos, arena, piedra chancada, etc.   
 
Nelly Virginia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Nelly Virginia belongs to Asociación Arariwa's “Juntas y Unidas” (Together and United) community bank in the city of Cusco.  She lives in the same city.  Cusco is a charming city which dates back to Inca times.  It was built on the site of the ancient Inca city.

Nelly Virginia is 45 years old and has four children.  Her main business activity is the sale of building materials such as sand, gravel and plaster.  She can be found every day from 7 in the morning to 6 in the evening in her small business.  She has been in this business for several years and it is doing very well thanks to the great effort which she puts into her work.  Nelly Virginia is a hard-working and responsible woman who is getting her family ahead.  With her loan for $400 USD, Nelly Virginia would like to increase her business and buy building materials such as building blocks, bricks, sand, gravel, etc.

Nelly Virginia is grateful for the opportunity which she is being given with this loan and therefore pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy building materials such as building blocks, bricks, sand, gravel, etc.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra  pertenece al banco comunal “Juntas y Unidas” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad. Cusco es una ciudad encantadora que se remonta a los tiempos Incas. Construida en la base de la antigua ciudad Inca. 

Sandra tiene 24 años y tiene un hijo. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de materiales de construcción como por ejemplo arena, piedra chancada y yeso. La puede encontrar a la socia todos los días de 7 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la noche en su pequeño negocio. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Sandra  es una mujer trabajadora y responsable que saca a delante a su familia. Con su próximo préstamo, Sandra  que espera recibir $ 500 USD. Por el momento,  desea incrementar el negocio y va comprar materiales de construcción como bloquetas de construcción, ladrillos, arena, cemento, piedra chancada, etc.   
 
Sandra se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Sandra is a member of the Communal Bank “Juntas y Unidas” (Together and United), which is part of Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco. She lives in the same city. Cusco is a charming city that dates back to the times of the Incas and served as a base for the ancient Incan empire.

Sandra is 24 years old and has one child. Her business involves selling construction materials such as sand, gravel, and plaster. She can be found working at her small business between the hours of 7am and 6pm. Sandra has been in business for several years and has done very well as a result of the effort she puts into her work. She is a hardworking and responsible woman who wants to move her family forward. With her next loan, Sandra hopes to receive $500 USD to expand her business and purchase construction materials such as blocks, bricks, sand, gravel, and other products.

Sandra is grateful for the opportunity that has been provided and promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials to sell such as blocks, bricks, sand, gravel, and other products

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz Marina pertenece al banco comunal “Juntas y Unidas” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad. Cusco es una ciudad encantadora que se remonta a los tiempos Incas. Construida en la base de la antigua ciudad Inca. 


Luz Marina tiene 60 años, es casada y tiene cinco hijos. Su actividad económica principal de Luz Marina es brindar servicios de viajes, ella tiene una pequeña agencia de viaje que esta implementada con las necesidades básicas. La puede encontrar a la socia todos los días de 9 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la noche en su pequeño negocio. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Luz Marina es una mujer trabajadora y responsable que saca a delante a su familia. Con su próximo préstamo, Luz Marina que espera recibir $ 500 USD. Por el momento,  desea implementar la agencia de viaje.


Luz Marina se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is a member of the Communal Bank “Juntas y Unidas” (Together and United), which is part of Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco. She lives in the same city. Cusco is a charming city that dates back to the times of the Incas and served as a base for the ancient Incan empire.

Luz Marina is 60 years old, married, and has five children. Her business involves providing travel services. She has a small travel agency that she started with just the basic necessities. Luz Marina can be found working at her small business between the hours of 9am and 6pm. She has been in business for several years and has done very well as a result of the effort she puts into her work. Luz Marina is a hardworking and responsible woman who wants to move her family forward. With her next loan, she hopes to receive $500 USD to keep her travel agency in operation.

Luz Marina is grateful for the opportunity that has been provided and promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Operating capital to keep her travel agency running

loans.name: Two By Two Group

texts.en:
Meet members of the “Two By Two” group from Makeni, a city in northern Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to apply for a loan of SLL 2,900,000 for the entire group. With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions. 

Kadiatu S. is the leader of this group. The forty-year-old is married to a gold dealer and they have two children. Kadiatu has been a businesswoman for many years now. She sells groundnuts, rice, slippers, etc. With her share of this loan, she will buy the above-mentioned items at wholesale prices to add to her business inventory. 

(Also included on the right in the photo is loan officer Mohamed Munu handing over the loan to the clients.)

loans.use: Buy groundnuts, rice, slippers, etc. at wholesale prices

loans.name: Maria Juana

texts.es:
María, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, posee una tienda donde ofrece a los clientes una variedad de productos de uso domestico, ella es madre soltera tiene 2 hijas de 28 y 30 años de edad, trabajan y le ayudan con los gastos del hogar.
Este negocio nació por la necesidad de crecer a sus hijas, ya que viéndose sola para trabajar y llevar la alimentación diaria al hogar ella decidió tener esta tienda, el horario de atención es de 7:00am a 7:00pm, actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para comprar mercadería y abastecer su inventario;  este préstamo le ayudara a satisfacer la demanda de los clientes y a mantenerles siempre la preferencia de estos.
Las aspiraciones de ella son progresar con su familia y mejorar cada día las condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
María lives in El Transito, Department of San Miguel. She has a store where she offers her customers a variety of household products. María is a single mother with two daughters, ages 28 and 30, who work and help with the household expenses.

This business was started out of necessity so that she could support her daughters. Since she was the only one capable of working and providing for the daily needs, María decided to open a store that she currently manages between the hours of 7am and 7pm.

She is currently requesting a loan to buy merchandise for restocking her inventory. This will help her meet the demands of her customers and cater to their preferences. Her aspirations are to make progress with her family and to improve her living conditions every day.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Maria del Carmen pertenece al banco comunal “Juntas y Unidas” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad. Cusco es una ciudad encantadora que se remonta a los tiempos Incas. Construida en la base de la antigua ciudad Inca. 


Maria del Carmen tiene 29 años y tiene tres hijos. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de materiales de construcción como por ejemplo arena, piedra chancada y yeso. La puede encontrar a la socia todos los días de 7 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la noche en su pequeño negocio. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Maria del Carmen es una mujer trabajadora y responsable que saca a delante a su familia. Con su próximo préstamo, Maria del Carmen que espera recibir $ 300 USD. Por el momento,  desea incrementar el negocio y va comprar materiales de construcción como bloquetas de construcción, ladrillos, arena, cemento, piedra chancada, etc.   

 
Maria del Carmen se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Maria del Carmen is a member of the Communal Bank “Juntas y Unidas” (Together and United), which is part of Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco. She lives in the same city. Cusco is a charming city that dates back to the times of the Incas and served as a base for the ancient Incan empire.

Maria del Carmen is 29 years old and has three children. Her business involves selling construction materials such as sand, gravel, and plaster. She can be found managing her small business every day between the hours of 7am and 6pm. Maria del Carmen has been in business for several years and has done very well as a result of the effort she puts into her work. She is a hardworking and responsible woman who wants to move her family forward. With her next loan, she hopes to receive $300 USD to expand her business and purchase construction materials such as blocks, bricks, sand, gravel, and other products.

Maria del Carmen is grateful for the opportunity that has been provided and promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase blocks, bricks, sand, gravel, and other products to sell

loans.name: Tamaraneh Traders Group

texts.en:
Kadiatu K. is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Kadiatu was born in Makeni city, about forty years ago. She is married to a businessman and the couple has two children who are in primary school.

For seven years now, Kadiatu has been selling rice, palm oil, salt, fish, etc. retail. With the help of this loan, these entrepreneurs will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions. Kadiatu will use her share of the loan (SLL 1,400,000) to expand her business, buying the above-mentioned items in large quantity to add to her business inventory.

(Also included on the right in the photo is loan officer Daniel B. Banya handing over the loan to the clients.)

loans.use: Buy rice, palm oil, salt, fish, etc. in large quantity

loans.name: Abu

texts.en:
Pictured here is Abu J.. The forty-two-year-old was born in Rogbureh village; he has nine children, seven of whom are attending primary and secondary schools. His wife is petty trader. 

Abu has been a businessman for twenty-two years now. He is seeking a loan of SLL 3,000,000 for the first time from SMT/Kiva lenders in order to further expand his business. He sells used clothes. With the help of this loan, he will be able to buy bales of used clothes to add to his business inventory.

loans.use: Buy bales of used clothes to add to his business inventory

loans.name: Tigo Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “Tigo” group. They are small-scale businesswomen based in Makeni, a city in northern Sierra Leone. This is not the first loan these entrepreneurs are accessing from SMT/Kiva lenders. With this new loan, however, they will be able to further expand their businesses, make more profit and consequently improve their standard of living. 

The leader of this group is Isata K.. Isata is age thirty-eight; she was born in Makeni city where she is currently residing together with her husband and five children. Her husband is a farmer; three of her children are attending primary school and two are  in secondary school. Isata has been a businesswoman for five years now. She sells cooked foo-foo (fast-cooking food made out of cassava roots).  With this loan, she will buy raw foo-foo and cassava roots in large quantity.

(Also included on the right in the photo is loan officer Daniel B. Banya handing over the loan to the clients.)

loans.use: Buys raw foo-foo and cassava roots in large quantity.

loans.name: Edix Mercedes

texts.es:
Doña Edix tiene 51 años de edad, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, es madre soltera y vive con su hija de 4 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de productos necesarios para el hogar, ella inicio este negocio por la necesidad que tenia y por su hija ya que tendría que ver la forma de que no le faltara nada.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar mercadería ya que su negocio no cuenta con lo suficiente para ofrecer a los clientes, ella quiere invertir en productos necesarios para el hogar.
Su principal propósito es tener un negocio estable para que no le falte la alimentación a su hija, tener una fuente de ingreso solida que le permita sobrellevar su hogar.
texts.en:
Doña Edix is 51 years old and resides in San Rafael Oriente, Department of San Miguel. She is a single mother and has a four year old daughter. Edix sells basic products for the home. She started this business out of necessity so that she could support her daughter and see that she lacked nothing.

Edix is requesting a loan so that she can buy merchandise for her business since she does not have sufficient inventory to offer to her customers. She wants to invest in basic household products. Her main goal is to have a stable business so that her daughter will not go hungry. By having a strong source of income, she will be able to provide for her home.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
Maritza pertenece al banco comunal “Juntas y Unidas” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad. Cusco es una ciudad encantadora que se remonta a los tiempos Incas. Construida en la base de la antigua ciudad Inca. 


Maritza tiene 45 años y tiene dos hijos. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de materiales de construcción como por ejemplo arena, piedra chancada y yeso. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Maritza es una mujer trabajadora y responsable que saca a delante a su familia. Con su próximo préstamo, Maritza que espera recibir $ 500 USD. Por el momento,  desea incrementar el negocio y va comprar materiales de construcción como bloquetas de construcción, ladrillos, arena, cemento, piedra chancada, etc.   

 
Maritza se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.

Maritza is a member of the Communal Bank “Juntas y Unidas” (Together and United), which is part of Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco. She lives in the same city. Cusco is a charming city that dates back to the times of the Incas and served as a base for the ancient Incan empire.

Maritza is 45 years old and has two children. Her business involves selling construction materials such as sand, gravel, and plaster. She has been in business for several years and has done very well as a result of the effort she puts into her work. Maritza is a hardworking and responsible woman who wants to move her family forward. With her next loan, she hopes to receive $500 USD to expand her business and purchase construction materials such as blocks, bricks, sand, gravel, and other products.

Maritza is grateful for the opportunity that has been provided and promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase blocks, bricks, sand, gravel, and other products to sell

Marilu pertenece al banco comunal “Juntas y Unidas” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad. Cusco es una ciudad encantadora que se remonta a los tiempos Incas. Construida en la base de la antigua ciudad Inca.

Con su próximo préstamo, Marilu que espera recibir $ 800 USD. Por el momento,  desea incrementar el negocio y va 
 

Marilu se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Marilu is a member of the Communal Bank “Juntas y Unidas” (Together and United), which is part of Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco. She lives in the same city. Cusco is a charming city that dates back to the times of the Incas and served as a base for the ancient Incan empire.

Marilu is 35 years old, married, and has two children. Her business involves selling construction materials such as sand, gravel, and plaster. loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José Luis tienen 23 años de edad, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, donde vive con su esposa, ambos trabajan para los gastos del hogar, el tiene el negocio de venta de ropa y lo atiende dese las 7:00am a 5:00pm, este negocio fue iniciado con ayuda de su madre ya que ella es comerciante de ropa también.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de prendas de vestir con modas del momento, esto le ayudara a mantener la clientela y a que nuevos lleguen también atraídos por la mercadería que ofrece,  el quiere satisfacer los gustos es por eso que en esta época que se acerca es un tiempo donde más se busca ropa para las fiestas de fin de año.
Los sueños de José Luis son como comerciante crecer cada día y brindar un buen servicio y atención a los clientes, y como persona superarse y mejorar las condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
José Luis is 23 years old and resides with his wife in El Transito in the Department of San Miguel. They both work to cover the household expenses. José Luis has a business selling clothes and manages it from 7am to 5pm. He started this business with the help of his mother, who is also clothing merchant.

José Luis is requesting a loan to buy articles of clothing that are currently in fashion. This will help him keep his existing customers as well as attract new ones with the arrival of more merchandise to offer. He wants to cater to the tastes of each customer since the time is coming when most people are looking for clothes to buy for the year-end festivities.

His dreams include becoming a merchant who grows each day and provides good service to his customers. In addition, he hopes to excel as a person and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: Purchase clothing to sell

loans.name: Raul Haroldo

texts.es:
Raul Haroldo pertenece al banco comunal “Juntas y Unidas” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad. Cusco es una ciudad encantadora que se remonta a los tiempos Incas. Construida en la base de la antigua ciudad Inca. 

Raul Haroldo  tiene 35 años, es casado y fruto de esta unión tienen dos hijos. Su actividad económica principal es atender una tienda de internet y un snack que son de su propiedad,el socio atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Raul Haroldo es una hombre trabajador y responsable que saca a delante a su familia. Con su próximo préstamo, Raul Haroldo que espera recibir $ 600 USD. Por el momento,  desea mejorar el negocio y va a comprar sillas y mesas para el interner y snack.
 
Raul Haroldo se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Raul Haroldo is a member of the Communal Bank “Juntas y Unidas” (Together and United), which is part of Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco. He lives in the same city. Cusco is a charming city that dates back to the times of the Incas and served as a base for the ancient Incan empire.

Raul Haroldo is 35 years old, married, and has two children. His business involves selling construction materials such as sand, gravel, and plaster. Raul Haroldo has been in business for several years and has done very well as a result of the effort he puts into his work. He is a hardworking and responsible gentleman who wants to move his family forward. With his next loan, Raul Haroldo hopes to receive $600 USD to expand his business and purchase construction materials such as blocks, bricks, sand, gravel, and other products. 

Raul Haroldo is grateful for the opportunity that has been provided and promises to complete his payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase blocks, bricks, sand, gravel, and other products

loans.name: Rosa Elva

texts.es:
Rosa, reside en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel, tiene 46 años de edad, ella vive con su madre, una hermana, sus dos hijos un hijastro y su esposo; se dedica a la venta de medicinas ofreciéndola de forma ambulante por los alrededores del lugar, no tiene un horario fijo, y actualmente está en la necesidad de invertir al negocio pero no cuenta con el dinero necesario, por lo solicita un préstamo que le solvente esta situación que atraviesa por el momento.
Su propósito es abastecer de más medicinas para tener mayor oportunidad de vender ya que si ofrecer diferentes clases de medicina podrá atender las necesidades a sus clientes.
Quiere que sus clientes se sientan satisfechos y proveerles de las medicinas que necesitan para sus enfermedades, ayudándoles de esta manera para que gocen de salud; también sus propósitos son ser mejor madre cada día y cubrir con las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
Rosa lives in San Rafael Oriente in the Department of San Miguel. She is 46 years old and lives with her mother, a sister, her two children, her husband, and a stepson. Rosa sells medicines as a street vendor in the surrounding neighborhoods. She does not work on a fixed schedule and currently needs to invest in her business but does not have the necessary funds. For this reason, she is requesting a loan so that she can resolve her present situation.

Her goal is to be stocked with more medicines so that she will have more opportunities to sell and be able to offer different types of remedies that can meet the needs of her customers. She wants to satisfy her customers and provide them with the medicines they need for their illnesses, thereby helping them experience good health. In addition, she strives to be a better mother each day and provide for the household needs.

loans.use: Purchase medicines to sell

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Adimdin Group

texts.en:
Abu K. is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. He was born in Masorie village, in Northern Sierra Leone about 58 years ago. He is married to a businesswoman and the couple has five children who are attending both primary and secondary schools. Abu is a farmer and has been a farmer for over 35 years now. He is requesting this loan in order to invest in his farm. With this loan, Abu is going to pay for labor to help him plough the land and will use the remainder to buy agricultural produce.

Attached to this photo is a snapshot of a borrower who was not able to be present for the group photo.

loans.use: To pay for labor and buy agricultural produce

loans.name: Malaneh Group

texts.en:
Meet members of the “Malaneh” group from Masorie village in northern Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to apply for a loan of SLL 700,000 for each. With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions. 

Sullay F.  (pictured in the middle) is the leader of this group. The forty-nine-year-old is married to a farmer and they have eight children who are attending school.  Sullay has been a farmer for more than thirty years now. He wants this loan in order to pay labor and buy seeds to plant in his farm.

loans.use: Pay labor and buy seeds to plant in his farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy iron, locks, metal sheets and paint

loans.name: Maruja

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “JUNTAS Y UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco  y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maruja; ella tiene 62 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. fotocopiadora, ella tiene una pequeña tienda que atienD. desD. las 7:30 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar papel al por mayor.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the community bank "Juntas y Unidas" which translates to "together and united". The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province and department of Cusco.

The member is Mrs. Maruja, she is 62 years old and is married with 6 children. She alternates her daily activities with a copier business. She has a small store which she tends to from 7:30 am until 8:00 pm. She wants to expand her business and is requesting a loan to buy paper in bulk.

The member thanks those who are part of this dream through these means and agrees to comply with the payment of her dues on time.

loans.use: Purchase paper in bulk.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “CORAZON DE JESUS DE CCATCCAPAMPA ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Jesus;   él tiene 53 años de edad, es casado y tiene 5 hijos,  El socio es natural de Ocongate,  Él socio trabajaba como obrero en la carretera interoceánica,  y también es carpintero de oficio, el socio ahora solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales de carpintería como son madera, el viajará a la ciudad de Puerto Maldonado a comprar madera al por mayor. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar madera.

El socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This parnter belongs to the community bank “CORAZON DE JESUS DE CCATCCAPAMPA ” which translates to "Heart of Jesus of Ccatccapampa".  The bank is located in the Ocongate district which belongs to the Quispicanchis province in the department of Cusco.

The partner is Mr. Jesus, he is 53 years old, married and has 5 children. He is a native of Ocongate. He worked as a laborer on the inter-oceanic highway and is also a carpenter. He is requesting a loan to purchase carpentry materials such as wood. He will travel to the city of Puerto Maldonado to buy wood in bulk. 

He appreciates and values the loan provided through this medium and also agrees to comply with the payment of his dues on time.

loans.use: Purchase wood.

loans.name: Marleni Vanesa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “JUNTAS Y UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra.Marleni Vanesa; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, ella vende en forma independiente a diferentes lugares como instituciones y también al público en general, ella quiere tener una tienda donde pueda vender la ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como pantalones, chompas, blusas y casacas.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Marleni Vanesa is a member of the Communal Bank “Juntas y Unidas” (Together and United), which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is 38 years old, married, and has two children. Marleni divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling clothes. She works independently by selling to different places, such as institutions, as well as the general public. Marleni wants to have a store where she can sell clothing. She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as trousers, sweaters, blouses, and jackets.

Marleni is grateful to those how have helped her fulfill her dream and promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase trousers, sweaters, blouses, and jackets

loans.name: Nerida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “JUNTAS Y UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra.Nerida; ella tiene 39 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de chompas, ella trabaja en forma independiente llevando las chompas a diferentes centros artesanales y por medio de este trabajo saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere tener una tienda para vender las chompas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar chompas al por mayor.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Nerida is a member of the Communal Bank “Juntas y Unidas” (Together and United), which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is 39 years old, married, and has three children. Nerida divides her time between her daily activities and her business of buying and selling sweaters. She works independently by bringing the sweaters to different craft centers to sell so that her children can get ahead. Nerida wants to have a store where she can sell sweaters. She is requesting a loan in order to buy sweaters in bulk.

Nerida is grateful to those how have helped her fulfill her dream and promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase sweaters in bulk

loans.name: Rosa Mistica Group

texts.es:
Felipe D. Jesus A. H., soltero, 29 años D. edad, nacido en Cerro D. Pasco y D. profesion carpintero.
Felipe D. Jesus trabaja en compañia D. su señora madre desD. hace hace 15 años. El arte D. la carpinteria viene D. generacion en generacion y èl lo aprendio D. su padre a tenprana edad.
Actualmente gracias a esta actividad, Felipe D. Jesus ayuda a sus hermanos menores, quienes se encuentran en edad escolar.
En su pequeño, pero humilD. taller, trabaja con 2 colaboradores, quienes reciben un incentivo por el trabajo que realizan al destajo.
El prestamo que se le otorga, lo invertira en la compra D. maderas para la elaboracion D. sus muebles, puertas y demas trabajos que tiene pendiente D. entrega.
texts.en:
Felipe D. Jesus A. H. is 29 years old, single, and was born in Cerro D. Pasco. He is a carpenter by profession.

Felipe D. Jesus has worked with his mother for 15 years. The art of carpentry has been passed down from generation to generation. He learned the traD. from his father at an early age. Thanks to this business, Felipe D. Jesus is able to support his younger siblings who are in school.

In his small humble workshop, Felipe D. Jesus works with two assistants who receive a commission for each piece they complete. The loan that is being granted will be invested in the purchase of wood for making furniture, doors, and other jobs that are pending delivery.

loans.use: Purchase wood

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “CORAZON DE JESUS DE CCATCCAPAMPA ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Margarita;   la socia tiene 39 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos, la socia se dedica  al transporte de carga de papa, maíz entre otros productos agrícolas, la socia muy gentil accedió a que la entrevistáramos para preguntarle en que invertiría el crédito en este nuevo ciclo y ella nos invito mediante su conyugue a su casa, ella dio a luz hacia dos días recientemente razón por la cual no pudo asistir a la reunión pero el conyugue insistió en que la viéramos y ella nos atendió tan amable. La socia Margarita invertirá parte de sus crédito en el combustible del camión que junto a su conyugue tiene, también ahora le viene bien para comprar algunos víveres familiares y para llevar a la posta al menor en algunas semanas. La socia también comprará semillas para la nueva siembra de maíz y de papa. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra  de semillas agrícolas, combustible para el camión y víveres familiares.

La socia  agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Margarita is a member of the Communal Bank “Corazon de Jesus de Ccatccapampa”, which is located in the District of Ocongate in Quispicanchis Province, Department of Cusco.

She is 39 years old, in a common law marriage, and has three children. Margarita transports shipments of potatoes, corn, and other agricultural products. She kindly agreed to be interviewed in order to discuss her plans for this loan, which will be her ninth. Margarita was not able to attend the group meeting because she recently gave birth two days ago, so her husband invited the interviewers to come to their house to come speak with her. She will invest part of her loan in the purchase of fuel for the truck that she and her husband own. Now is also a good time to buy a few provisions so that they can feed their young one for the next few weeks. In addition, Margarita will buy seeds to plant a new crop of corn and potatoes.

She appreciates and values the loan that has been provided. Therefore, she promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase fuel for her truck, vegetable seeds, and provisions for her family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase coffee beans

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “CORAZON DE JESUS DE CCATCCAPAMPA ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Julia;   la socia tiene 36 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos, la socia se dedica  a atención de sus pequeña tienda de abarrotes, ella tiene una tienda en la cual vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad, ella ahora desea implementar sus tienda para abastecer a su pueblo, ella comprar ala por mayor arroz, azúcar, aceite y otros productos. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra  de mercadería para la tienda abarrotes.

La socia  agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Julia is a member of the Communal Bank “Corazon de Jesus de Ccatccapampa”, which is located in the District of Ocongate in Quispicanchis Province, Department of Cusco.

She is 36 years old, in a common law marriage, and has three children. Julia manages a small grocery store where she sells all types of basic necessities. She now wants to keep her store in operation so that she can provide supplies for her town. Julia wants to buy rice, sugar, oil, and other products in bulk so she is requesting a loan to invest in merchandise for her grocery store.

She appreciates and values the loan that has been provided. Therefore, she promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise for her store

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “CORAZON DE JESUS DE CCATCCAPAMPA ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana;   la socia tiene 43 años de edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos, la socia se dedica  a la compra y venta de muebles, ella compra de Cusco los muebles de sala comedor, los estantes y otros y los vende en su casa en el primer piso ella instalo una pequeña tienda para exhibir los muebles. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de algunos muebles para la venta.

La socia  agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Juana is a member of the Communal Bank “Corazon de Jesus de Ccatccapampa”, which is located in the District of Ocongate in Quispicanchis Province, Department of Cusco.

She is 43 years old, married, and has three children. Juana buys and sells furniture. She acquires dining room furniture, shelving, and other items in Cusco and then sells them from her house. On the first floor, she has a small shop where she displays the furniture. Juana is requesting a loan to invest in a few furniture pieces to sell.

She appreciates and values the loan that has been provided. Therefore, she promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase a few furniture pieces to sell

loans.name: Ezequiel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “CORAZON DE JESUS DE CCATCCAPAMPA ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Ezequiel;   él tiene 38 años de edad, es conviviente  y tiene 3 hijos,  El socio es natural de Ocongate,  Él socio trabajaba como carpintero el tiene un pequeño taller instalado en su casa y desde ahí fabrica muebles, el desea en un futuro poder tener un buen taller en el cual tenga todas las herramientas necesarias para así poder realizar trabajos con acabados de primera y poder hacer variedad de muebles. Por ahora el socio solicita el préstamo para comprar unas pequeñas herramientas como martillos, clavos, un poco de madera.  El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar madera.

El socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sr. Ezequiel is a member of the Communal Bank “Corazon de Jesus de Ccatccapampa”, which is located in the District of Ocongate in Quispicanchis Province, Department of Cusco.

He is 38 years old, in a common law marriage, and has three children. Ezequiel is a native of Ocongate. He works as a carpenter from a small workshop established in his home where he makes furniture. In the future, he wants to have a nice workshop with all the necessary tools so that he can provide first rate work and produce a variety of furniture. At the moment, Ezequiel is requesting a loan to buy a few supplies such as hammers, nails, and some wood.

He appreciates and values the loan that has been provided. Therefore, he promises to complete his payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase hammers, nails, and wood

loans.name: Victoriano

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “CORAZON DE JESUS DE CCATCCAPAMPA ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Victoriano;   él tiene 57 años de edad, es casado y tiene 5 hijos,  El socio es natural de Ocongate,  Él socio trabaja vendiendo plásticos y productos como baldes, tachos, pelotas entre otros productos; El socio tiene una pequeña tienda de venta de plásticos desde hace 14 años y todos en el pueblo lo conocen en la época de lluvias el llega a vender todos sus rollos de plástico grueso, los pobladores llegan a desesperarse en la época de lluvias que forran sus casitas con plástico para evitar que se remoje con la lluvia el adobe de sus casitas humildes. El socio necesita comprar productos por que las lluvias se avecinan y el implementara su tienda.  El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar plástico.

El socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sr. Victoriano is a member of the Communal Bank “Corazon de Jesus de Ccatccapampa”, which is located in the District of Ocongate in Quispicanchis Province, Department of Cusco.

He is 57 years old, married, and has five children. Victoriano is a native of Ocongate. He sells plastics and products such as buckets, trash containers, balls, and other items. Victoriano has a small store where he has been selling plastics for 14 years. Everyone in town knows him and comes to his shop during the rainy season to buy rolls of thick plastic. The villagers come in desperation during the rainy season so that they can line their homes with plastic to prevent the moisture from seeping through the walls of their modest adobe houses. Victoriano needs to buy products for the approaching rains and to keep his store in operation, so he is requesting a loan to buy plastic.

He appreciates and values the loan that has been provided. Therefore, he promises to complete his payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase plastic to sell during the rainy season

loans.name: Abla Wola Dope

texts.fr: Cette  femme est mariée et mère de 2 enfants . Elle genère des activités de revenu et s’invertit dans la restauration. Elle a 34 ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché local d’assiyéyé . Elle exerce cette activité 2 ans déjà.  Elle sollicite ce credit pour acheter un tas d'igname, 2 bidons de sodabi, 2 sacs de mais,2 sacs de riz pour mieux satisfaire ses clients.
texts.en: This woman is married and the mother of two. She makes a living by preparing food for sale. She is 34 years old. She stocks up at the local market of Assiyéyé. She has been in this business for two years already. She is seeking this loan to purchase a pile of yams, two jugs of sodabi [a local liquor]. two bags of corn, and two bags of rice in order to better meet her customers’ needs.

loans.use: Purchasing materials necessary for food production

loans.name: Sebastiana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “CORAZON DE JESUS DE CCATCCAPAMPA ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Sebastiana;   la socia tiene 38 años de edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos, la socia se dedica  a la artesanía, ella compra lana de alpaca o de oveja y después de hacer un muy buen pulido y convertirlo en madejas de lana ella teje a mano con la tradicional técnica que heredaron de nuestros antepasados los inkas, la socia entonces elabora frazadas, mantas, chalinas, correas, medias, chompas, ponchos y mucho más a mano. Ella solicita el préstamo para comprar lana y comprar tintes vegetales para teñir las lanas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de lanas y tintes vegetales para la artesanía (telares).

La socia  agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Sebastiana is a member of the Communal Bank “Corazon de Jesus de Ccatccapampa”, which is located in the District of Ocongate in Quispicanchis Province, Department of Cusco.

She is 38 years old, married, and has three children. Sebastiana earns her living from making handicrafts. She buys alpaca and sheep’s wool and gives it a good cleaning. Afterwards, she turns it into spools of thread for making hand woven articles. Sebastiana uses traditional techniques that were passed down from her Incan ancestors. She produces blankets, covers, scarves, belts, socks, sweaters, ponchos, and other handmade items. Sebastiana is requesting a loan to buy wool and vegetable dyes for coloring the wool used in her weaving.

She appreciates and values the loan that has been provided. Therefore, she promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase wool & vegetable dyes

loans.name: Donata

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “CORAZON DE JESUS DE CCATCCAPAMPA ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Donata;   la socia tiene 39 años de edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos, la socia se dedica  a la artesanía ella elabora manualmente bellos telares con motivos típicos de la zona ella teje adornos sobre los telares que va haciendo como por ejemplo pone pajaritos, lagunitas, montañas, animalitos, el sol y todos los motivos de la naturaleza del mismo modo que cuando Vivian los antepasados inkas y ella sigue utilizando la técnica inka para estos bellos motivos andinos. La socia desea comprar  lanas y tintes naturales para elaborar sus mantas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de lanas y tintes vegetales para los telares.

La socia  agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Donata is a member of the Communal Bank “Corazon de Jesus de Ccatccapampa”, which is located in the District of Ocongate in Quispicanchis Province, Department of Cusco.

She is 39 years old, married, and has three children. Donata produces beautiful handmade crafts that reflect traditional motifs of the area. Her woven decorations contain birds, small lagoons, mountains, animals, the sun, and other themes of nature. Donata uses the same techniques as her Incan ancestors to capture the beautiful Andean themes. She wants to buy wool and natural dyes for making blankets, so she is requesting a loan to invest in these supplies for her weaving.

Donata appreciates and values the loan that has been provided. Therefore, she promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase wool & vegetable dyes

loans.name: Adjo Agnes

texts.fr: Adjo  a 43 ans, mariée et mère de 2 enfants. Elle est revendeuse de céréales et de charbons pour contribuer aux charges du ménage. Elle exerce dans cette activité depuis 10 ans déjà. Elle achète à l’intérieur   du pays et revend à Lomé en détail. Elle espère augmenter son commerce  et sollicite ce prêt. Ce crédit permettra d’accroitre sa marge bénéficiaire.
texts.en: Adjo is 43 years old, married and the mother of 2 children. She sells grain and charcoal to help with the household expenses. She has been in this business for 10 years. She buys her supplies in the interior of the country and sells them at retail prices in Lomé. She hopes to expand her business and is requesting this loan, which will enable her to increase her profit margin.

loans.use: Purchase of corn, oil and charcoal

loans.name: Amavi

texts.fr: Cette femme a 50 ans, mariée et a 4 enfants. Pour participer aux charges du ménage, fait le commerce de charbons de bois, d’huile de palme et du jus. Elle cumule près de 14 ans dans cette activité. Elle achète à Anié et revend à la devanture de sa maison à djidjolé. Le crédit  sollicité sera destiné a l'achat de 40 sacs de charbon, 10 bidons d'huile et 2 sacs de bissap.
texts.en:
This 50-year-old woman is married and has four children. To help with the household expenses, she sells charcoal, palm oil and juice. She has nearly 14 years of experience in this business. 

She gets her stocks in Anié and sells the goods in front of her house in Djidjolé. The loan she is seeking will be used to purchase forty sacks of coal, ten cans of oil cans and two bags of bissap (dried hibiscus flowers).

loans.use: Purchase of coal, oil and juice

loans.name: Ama
