This is an agricultural region located more than an hour and forty-five minutes from the city of Chiclayo.  It is chiefly noted for its rugged terrain owing to its proximity to the country's northern mountains.

Fermin sells basic goods and groceries in a small grocery store in his home.  There he provides his customers with all sorts of daily-use products for which they would otherwise have to travel to town.  His business is very popular because he always serves his customers in a friendly manner and offers them good quality products.

Fermin would like to expand his business by buying more products so that he can expand his sales and make more income.  This is why he is requesting a loan for 2,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He believes that it will help him achieve his goal.

Fermin is quite a well-known and well-respected person in his area.  People who know him consider him to be a calm and responsible person.

loans.use: To buy basic goods and groceries to expand his sales business

loans.name: María Andrea

texts.es:
María Andrea es una madre de familia de 36 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a un hijo en el distrito de Oyotún, una zona agrícola situada a más de hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Se caracteriza principalmente por poseer una geografía accidentada debido a la cercanía con la sierra norte del país.

Trabaja vendiendo productos de belleza y cosméticos por catálogo, ella cuenta con un grupo de clientes que le compran sus productos con frecuencia, mientras más pedidos le realizan obtiene mas puntos de parte de la empresa que le provee los productos y por consiguiente obtiene mayores ganancias. Por este motivo se esfuerza por obtener cada vez más clientes.

María desea contar con un capital estable para adquirir mas productos y contar con un stock fijo de cosméticos que permita a sus clientes adquirir los productos que necesitan rápidamente y no esperar hasta fin de mes, que es cuando le entregan los pedidos. Por ello ha solicitado por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

María es una mujer bastante entregada a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria para brindarles una mejor calidad de vida en el futuro.
texts.en:
María Andrea is a 36-year-old mother living with her husband and child in the district of Oyotún, an agricultural area situated more than an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo. This area is mainly characterized by its rugged landscape, due to the proximity of Peru's northern mountain range.

María Andrea sells beauty products and cosmetics from a  catalog. She has a group of regular customers who buy her products frequently. The more orders she gets, the more points she is awarded by the company that provides the products and consequently the bigger profit she makes. She therefore tries to continue attracting more customers.

María Andrea would like to have a stable capital in order to buy more products and have a fixed stock of cosmetics, thus allowing her customers to obtain the products they need quickly, without having to wait until the end of the month when the orders are fulfilled. She has therefore requested her first loan of 1,000 nuevos soles from Kiva Field Partner, Edpyme Alternativa.

María Andrea is devoted to her family. Her greatest wish is that she should continue to grow as an entrepreneur, so that she can provide her family with a better quality of life in the future.

loans.use: To buy cosmetic products to increase her sales.

loans.name: Maria Cecilia

texts.es:
María Cecilia es una madre D. familia D. 29 años D. edad que resiD. junto a su esposo y a su menor hijo en el sector Callanca del distrito D. Monsefú, una zona conocida por sus festividades turístisticas y religiosas. La zona se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo.

Se dedica junto a su esposo al cultivo D. flores, ruda y hortalizas en un pequeño terreno D. cultivo con el que cuentan. Ellos comercializan los productos entre los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona. Adicionalmente cuenta con una bodega en la cual brinda a sus vecinos diversos productos D. primera necesidad y abarrotes que suelen necesitarse a diario. Con los ingresos que ellos perciben D. estas actividades sacan adelante a su familia.

María desea adquirir mas productos para ampliar el inventario D. su bodega, asimismo desea adquirir fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a sus cultivos, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1500 nuevos soles que contribuyan al logro D. su objetivo.

Ella es una mujer bastante trabajadora y que se esfuerza a diario por salir adelante y brindarle a su hijo una mejor calidad D. vida. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una mujer amable y siempre dispuesta a ayudar a los demás.
texts.en:
María Cecilia is a 29 year-old mother who lives with her husband and young son in the Callanca sector of the district of Monsefú.  This is an area which is known for its tourist and religious festivities.  The area is twenty minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

Together with her husband she grows flowers, rue and vegetables on a small plot of land which they have.  They sell their products to traders who visit the area.  In addition, she has a small store in which she offers her neighbors basic products and groceries which are needed every day.  With the income that they make from these activities, they manage to keep their family going.

María would like to acquire more products to expand the inventory of her store.  She would also like to acquire fertilizers to help maintain her crops.  This is why she is requesting a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  It will help her to achieve her goal.

María is quite a hard-working woman and she works hard every day to get ahead and proviD. her son with a better quality of life.  People who know her consider her to be a friendly woman who is always ready to help others.

loans.use: To buy products to expand the store which she has in her home

loans.name: Rosaura

texts.es:
Rosaura tiene 53 años de edad, es soltera y vive junto a sus padres en el caserío Quemazón, una zona rural del distrito de Mórrope, de la provincia de Lambayeque, ubicado a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de verduras, granos y menestras en su domicilio, el negocio nació de la necesidad de agenciarse de un ingreso que le permitiera ayudar al sostenimiento de su familia y velar por la calidad de vida de sus padres, que son de edad avanzada. 

Este negocio es de mucha ayuda también para los vecinos de su caserío, ya que este queda muy alejado del pueblo central y ellos no tienen alimentos de primera necesidad al alcance de la mano. Debido a que la mayoría de vecinos de la zona son agricultores y reciben sus pagos los fines de semana ella ofrece sus productos al crédito y al contado, este sistema esta teniendo mucha acogida.

Rosaura ya ha tenido un crédito financiado por el fondo Kiva. Con ese crédito puedo ampliar su negocio adquririendo mercadería con lo cual pudo satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, ahora ella desea seguir implementando su negocio por lo que se encuentra solicitando nuevamente a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Ella está muy contenta y agradecida con las personas que colaboraron con su negocio a través de Kiva, la ayuda recibida ha renovado sus ganas de salir adelante y progesar. En su comunidad ella es una mujer bastante conocida y estimada, sus vecinos la consideran una mujer trabajadora, responsable y de confianza. Su mayor anhelo es otorgarle a sus padres una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosaura is 53 years old.  She is single and lives with her parents in the village of Quemazón, a rural area in the district of Mórrope, in the province of Lambayeque, one hour from the city of Chiclayo.

Rosaura has been selling greens, grains and mixed vegetables in her home for several years.  The business was born of necessity as she needed to make an income which would allow her to help support her family and look after her parents' quality of life as they are elderly.

This business is also of great help to the neighbors in her village since the village is very far from the central town and they don't have basic foodstuffs in easy reach.  Owing to the fact that most of her neighbors are farmers who receive their wages at the end of the week, Rosaura offers them products on credit and for cash.  This system is very popular.

Rosaura has already had a loan financed by Kiva.  With this loan she will be able to elxpand her business, acquiring merchandise with which she can fulfil her customers' demands.  She wants to continue building up her business which is why she is requesting a new loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1,500 nuevos soles which will help her to achieve her goal.

She is very happy and grateful to the people who are collaborating in her business through Kiva.  The help she has received has renewed her desire to get ahead and make progress.  In her community she is quite a well-know and respected person.  Her neighbors consider her to be a hard-working, responsible and trustworthy woman.  Her greatest wish is to be able to provide her parents with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy products to expand her home-based sales business

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
Rosario es una madre de familia de 42 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo en el distrito de Oyotún, una zona agrícola situada a más de hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Se caracteriza principalmente por tener una geografía accidentada debido a su cercanía con la sierra norte del país.

Rosario se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores, específicamente de aves de corral. Ella cría sus animales en un ambiente de su vivienda y los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde vive. Eventualmente las vende a sus vecinos. Con los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad ella se encarga de ayudar a su esposo, que es albañil, con el sostenimiento de los gastos familiares.

Rosario desea adquirir alimento balanceado para lograr que sus animales se desarrollen de mejor manera y puedan ser vendidos a mejor precio. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles.

Rosario es una mujer entregada a su familia y que siempre se esfuerza al máximo para sacarlos adelante. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
Rosario is a 42-year-old mother who lives with her husband in the Oyotún district, an agricultural area about an hour-and-a-half from Chiclayo. The area is noted for having a rugged terrain, being situated near the northern mountains of the country.

Rosario raises young animals, poultry birds in particular. She raises them in an area near her house, then offers them for sale to dealers who visit the area. She may also sell some to her neighbors. With her earnings from this business, she is able to help her husband, a brick mason, with the household expenses.

Rosario would like to buy a balanced feed for her animals. With this, they will develop better and she can sell them for a better price. For this purpose, she is seeking her first loan with Edpyme Alternativa, for 500 soles.

Rosario is a woman who is committed to her family and who always puts out the maximum effort to help them get ahead. People who know her have much esteem and affection for her.

loans.use: Buy balanced feed for poultry birds.

loans.name: Faustino

texts.es:
Faustino es un padre de familia de 54 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a un hijo en el caserío La Zaranda, una zona rural del distrito de Pítipo, distrito agrícola situado en la provincia de Ferreñafe. La zona se encuentra ubicada a cuarenta y cino minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace mas de viente años a trabajar en labores asociadas a la agricultura. El cuenta con una pequeña parcela de cultivo en donde suele sembrar granos como el maíz. Adicionalmente cuenta con algunas cabezas de ganado vacuno de las cuales comercializa la leche que producen.

Actualmente Faustino desea terminar de instalar su cultivo de maíz, por lo que desea terminar de preparar parte de su terreno, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de  2000 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa realizar su objetivo.

Faustino es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser alguien trabajador y entregado a su familia. En la zona donde vive, las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien responsable y de confianza.
texts.en:
Faustino is a 54 year old father who lives with his wife and child in the village of La Zaranda, a rural area in the District of Pítipo. This farming district is situated in Ferreñafe Province, which is located 45 minutes away from the city of Chiclayo.

Faustino has worked as a farmer for more than 20 years. He has a small parcel of farmland on which he grows basic grains, such as corn. In addition, he owns a few dairy cows and sells the milk they produce.

At the moment, Faustino wants to finish planting a crop of corn and needs to complete the preparation on part of his land. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 PEN so that he can accomplish his goal.

Faustino is a person who has always been known as someone who is a hard worker and dedicates himself to his family. In the area where he lives, the people who know him consider him to be someone who is responsible and trustworthy.

loans.use: Pay expenses related to planting corn

loans.name: Alberto

texts.en:
Alberto is twenty-nine years old.  He lives with his wife and their two children in the village of Pitipo Fundo Burga, which is located in the district of Mochumi in the province of Lambayeque.  The area is primarily rural and is located forty minutes to the north of the city of Chiclayo.  Alberto lives in the more commercial portion of the village, where small stores and shops congregate.

For the last two years Alberto has run a mototaxi that is modified for carrying large loads.  He provides transport services to his neighbors, moving seed, agricultural products, building supplies and any other cargo.  Alberto also works in a small metal shop where he provides welding, painting and other services in repairing or constructing items to serve the local populace.

Alberto has a good credit history.  He has requested this loan in order to make repairs to his mototaxi which is currently in need of maintenance.  He hopes that the repairs will help to reduce his ongoing expenses and allow his asset to continue generating income for his family.  Alberto dreams of sending his children to school and expanding his businesses.

loans.use: Repairs to his mototaxi

loans.name: Marcial

texts.es:
Marcial tiene 37 años de edad, es casado y vive junto a su esposa y a sus tres hijos en el sector Muy Finca del distrito de Mochumí, una zona agrícola situada en la provincia de Lambayeque, ubicado a una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace mas de doce años a la confección de vestidos y blusas. El confecciona estas prendas para luego vendérselas a un comerciante mayorista que le hace pedidos por temporadas, este negocio es una fuente importante de ingreso a la economía de su familia, adicionalmente cría y vende animales para ayudar a solventar los gastos familiares. Debido a que realiza su trabajo con muy buena calidad su negocio ha ido creciendo y sus pedidos han aumentado considerablemente.

Marcial ya ha tenido un préstamo financiado con el Fondo Kiva. Con el dinero de aquel préstamo pudo adquirir más material con el cual aumentó su producción y por ende su negocio creció durante los últimos meses. Actualmente el desea adquirir materiales para seguir aumentando su producción por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar nuevamente a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.

Marcial se encuentra agradecido con las personas que colaboraron con el a través del programa Kiva. Su mayor anhelo sigue siendo sacar adelante a su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida, por ello siempre se esfuerza al máximo en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Marcial, age 37, is married and lives with his wife and three children in the Muy Finca sector of the District of Mochumí.  This agricultural region lies in Lambayeque Province, which is located an hour and a half away from the city of Chiclayo.

Marcial has been producing dresses and blouses for more than twelve years.  After making these garments, he later sells them as a wholesale merchant according to seasonal orders.  This business is an important source of income for his family.  In addition, he raises and sells animals to help cover the family expenses.  Since his finished garments are of high quality, Marcial’s business has grown and his orders have increased considerably.

Marcial has already received a loan that was issued with Kiva funds.  The money from that loan was used to acquire more materials so that he could increase production.  As a result, his business has grown in recent months.  He currently wants to buy materials so that he can keep increasing his production.  For this reason, he is requesting a new loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1500 PEN.

Marcial is grateful to everyone who is part of the Kiva program.  His greatest wish is to continue moving his family forward and improve their quality of life.  To accomplish this, he always strives to do his best in his job.

loans.use: Purchase materials

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es:
Cesar tiene 19 años de edad, es soltero y vive junto a sus padres en el caserío Chacupe Alto, una zona  agrícola del distrito de La Victoria, se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de carga y pasajeros en una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado que está conformado por una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina para brindar servicio de transporte), el brinda este servicio en la zona donde vive y con los ingresos que percibe solventa sus gastos personales. Adicionalmente ayuda a sus padres trabajando en la agricultura, plantando hortalizas.

Actualmente el desea adquirir semillas de culantro para instalar una plantación de este arbusto en un terreno de cultivo que pertenece a su familia. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Cesar es un joven bastante trabajador y emprendedor. El tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante y hacer progresar a su familia. Las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien amable y tranquilo.Com
texts.en:
Cesar is 19 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the village of Chacupe Alto, an agricultural area that is in the District of La Victoria. This community is located twenty minutes away from the city of Chiclayo.

Cesar offers to transport cargo and passengers using a motorcycle taxi (a motorized vehicle that consists of a motorcycle and an attached cabin). He provides this service in the area where he lives and uses the income to cover his personal expenses. In addition, he helps his parents with the farm work by planting vegetables.

At the moment, Cesar wants to buy cilantro seeds so that he can begin planting this herb on his family’s land. For this reason, he is requesting his first loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 PEN to help accomplish his goal.

Cesar is a hardworking and enterprising young man. He has great desire to succeed and make progress for his family. The people who know him consider him to be someone who is friendly and peaceful.

loans.use: Purchase seeds for planting cilantro

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
Jose Manuel tiene 42 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su esposa y a dos hijos en una zona urbano marginal del distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz, es uno de los distritos más poblados de la región Lambayeque y es uno de los más pobres, su población se encuentra distribuida en zonas urbano marginales, las principales actividades económicas son el comercio y el transporte.

Se dedica a brindar servicio de taxi en un pequeño auto Tico de su propiedad. El brinda este servicio en  su distrito y en la ciudad de Chiclayo. Con los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad de encarga de sacar adelante a su familia.

José Manuel desea brindar mantenimiento a su vehículo, de modo que pueda trabajar de forma mas estable, por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.

José Manuel es una persona bastante responsable y entregada a su familia, el trata de esforzarse al máximo y trabajar muchas horas para sacar adelante a su familia y brindarles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José Manuel is 42 years old, married, and lives with his wife and two children in a marginalized urban area of the District of José Leonardo Ortiz. This district is one of the most populated in Lambayeque Region as well as one of the poorest. Its population is distributed among marginalized urban districts. The main business activities are trade and transportation.

José Manuel provides taxi services using a small Tico automobile that he owns. He provides his services in his district and in the city of Chiclayo. With the income that he earns from his business, he is able to move his family forward.

José Manuel wants to maintain his vehicle so that he can work in a stable manner. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 PEN so that he can meet this objective.

José Manuel is a responsible individual who is devoted to his family. He strives to the do the best at his job and works long hours so that his family can get ahead and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: Vehicle maintenance

loans.name: Bridget

texts.en: Bridget L. was born in 1972 and she had been married but is now separated. She had six children out of her fruitless marriage. She lives in Alabukam, a quarter in Bamenda North West Region of Cameroon. Bridget has faced some challenges in life. The most terrifying thing that happened in her life has been the issue of accidents and death of her family members. Poverty has been her major difficulty in life, the inability to raise capital for business projects. She plans to invest this loan in a transportation business. With this loan she plans to improve the living standard of her family with the proceeds from the investment. She believes the business will succeed because she has been in the business for a long time. She thinks there are pressing transport needs of local inhabitants. And also with the poor infrastructure, bikes are inevitable in the transport sector, hence her success. She also thinks her approach to her customers will be captivating and hence lead to the success of her business. The loan will help her community because they will be able to transport their farm produce from farm to markets and from their locality to urban centers for sales at low and affordable fares. Bridget will plough back her profit into her business and use part to care for her family. She also will use the proceeds to expand her business and save for rainy days. She prefers GHAPE because of the training she frequently receives and the low cost in obtaining and paying back a loan. About GHAPE The Grounded and Holistic Approach to People's Empowerment (GHAPE) is a non-profit NGO based in Bamenda, Cameroon. GHAPE works towards the empowerment of the poor and poverty alleviation through a highly multi-faceted approach. Every client is trained in business management, basic health, life skills, financial management, profit and loss, and family values. Clients are also required to contribute a small amount into a personal savings account; most clients save much more than the minimum requirement. GHAPE instils a sense of family and community within its clients and staff and has developed a strong bond of trust between the organization and its clients.

loans.name: Mboudjecko

texts.en: Mboudjecko J. was born in 1978. He is married to Nyonga Odette and they are blessed with three children all below the age of 15 years old. He lives in a small house of three rooms with his family. He lives in Bali Park, a quarter in Bamenda North West Region of Cameroon. J. has faced some challenges in life, amongst which are the inability to meet the basic necessities of his family, like clothing, feeding, transportation and educating himself and his children. He has faced difficulties in raising capital to start up a small business that will sustain him and his family. He plans to invest this loan in a gardening business. With this loan he is going to buy seedlings and farm products. He believes the business will succeed because the previous loan he took was repaid by the income raised from an old farm of his, therefore, he concludes that he is sure the business will succeed. He is certain that this business will succeed because the products he produces are highly demanded in the market. The loan will help his community because they will be able to afford all food ingredients at low or no cost. J. will plough back his profit into his business and use part to care for his family. He also will use the proceeds to pay his children’s school fees and cater to the family. He prefers GHAPE because of the training he frequently receives and the low cost in obtaining and paying back a loan. He faces the challenges of providing the basic needs for his family, including the inability to meet up with the basic necessities of his family like clothing, feeding, transportation and educating himself and his children. He also faces difficulties in raising capital to start up a small business. With this loan he is going to buy seedlings, pay rent on his piece of land and insecticides. loans.name: Elisabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth A. was born in 1953, she is married with two children. She works hard and strives higher for herself and the family. With the death of her first daughter, who was more of a sister, she was obliged to work very hard raising her son, and her plans for her son could only be realized with a larger income income which led her to joined GHAPE. 

With this loan, she plans to carryout  mixed farming and increased her business of cooked food. Her business is selling Koki that she provides to  the community with lunch at a cheaper cost and also food during ceremony. With the profit from this business she planned to buy her plot of land and build a house for her son.

Elizabeth will plough back her profit into her business and use part to care for her family. She also will use the proceeds to expand her business   and save for  rainy days. She prefers GHAPE because of the training she frequently receives and the low cost in obtaining and paying back a loan.

loans.use: Purchasing spare parts and developing his garage

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn C. is a married woman who lives in Purong, Brgy. Nabulao, Sipalay City, Negros Occidental. She earns her living by operating 3 business ventures:  Fruit vending, Buying and Selling rice and a Tricycle transport businesses. Her husband Ricardo C., who is 40 years old, works as a Driver to earn his living and also helps in his wife's business activities.  They have 6 children who are 11 to  18 years old. 

Marilyn joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2007 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past 5 loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Marilyn has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of PHP 12000 helped her earn a monthly profit of PHP 3,000,  uplifting the family's standard of living.  This time, for her 6th cycle loan, she is borrowing PHP 13,000, which she intends to use to buy more rice rice and root crops to sell so that she could continue to save up for future education of children and home repairs. Marilyn C. is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. 

About NWTF:
In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed to a member of a community who has earned the respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by clicking  the link to the   NWTF Kiva lending team  on Kiva.org to join our team.

She has been a member of NWTF-Project Dungganon since 1992 and has improved her living conditions with the help of her loans from NWTF and through her own efforts. By working hard in her General Store , Tobacco Sales and Livestock businesses, she is gradually making her family more economically stable. 

Dominga now earns an average monthly income of PHP 10,000. Dominga is borrowing PHP 12,000 so that she  could continue to  purchase more stocks to sell.   This will be her 18th loan from NWTF-Project Dungganon. Her previous loan of PHP 12,000, which she paid off well within its term was just another step in her journey toward economic freedom. Dominga aspires to elevate her family's living conditions and ensure their future well-being by following the  Dungganon way.

They have six children who are 17 to 30 years old, four of whom have their own families, and the other two have work to help the family. 

Aida joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2006 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past 12 loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Aida has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of 15,000 PHP helped her earn a monthly profit of about $118, raising the family's standard of living.  

This time, for her 13th cycle loan, she is borrowing 18,000 PHP, which she intends to use as additional capital for her businesses so that she can continue to save up for their future expansion. Aida Q. is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. 

About NWTF: 

In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed to a member of a community who has earned respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. 

Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by clicking  the link to the   NWTF Kiva lending team  on Kiva.org to join our team.
